name: InfluenzaVirusABAndSARSCoronoavirus2AntigenUpperRespiratoryPanel
title: Influenza Virus A B and SARS Coronoavirus 2 Antigen Upper Respiratory Panel
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to panels containing results for the detection of antigens in SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) and influenza A & B in the upper respiratory system.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of antigens in SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) and influenza virus A & B in the upper respiratory system.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes terms where the location is anything other than the upper respiratory system.)
